sentence: Who wants to stumble across the room in the dark if the phone rings or an urgent text arrives while you are slepingAlso during our second day we decided to use the gym as we usually do when we travel
From our room at the South Wing to the main lobby entrance can take some walking though good exercise and careful navigation
Take the subway and go somewhere else Exercise facility should be complementary to hotel guest
The only hotel I have seen that you need to pay extra for Gym
One recomendation50USD is a high price to pay for single day of gym usage

Our only critique of this hotel was the lack of air conditioning throughout the hotel our room had the old fashion thermostat which did not go below 14 degrees celsius and the gyms temperature we read as one day as 26 degrees celsius
The gym is large with a decent array of equipment including the old school vibrating belt machine and a large white hypobaric chamber which I was explicitly told I could not photograph not sure why
Having to pay extra to use the gym is always an annoyance too I can not think of any other hotel I have stayed at in recent years that still pulls that one
Overall if they did not have the stupid policy of charging for using the gym pool this would have been one of my favourite hotels in the world
A renovation work especially at the gym and pool would make it really perfect

I just loved everything about this hotel from the James Bond style reception hall through to the rooms breakfast massive and well equipped gym wonderful service typical high Japanese standard cleanliness etc
It has a wonderful pool and gym as well as a mall arcade for shopping
Good gym and Japanese sauna available for those who wishes to use
Standard room was very roomy and the gym completely equipped
Loved the gym pool and restaurants
Very comfortable Location indoor pool and gym
very good swimming pool gym sauna etc
Nice hotel great to have pool and gym area
Loved the gym and the pool
It has a large well equipped gym and a 20 meter pool with a lifeguard which is a massive bonus
